(All right Yanshosh!"claps Yanshosh on back, but hits too hard and 
Yanshosh breaks skull on rock." Uh....I gotta go!)

Starscream

Starscream saw Phobia's plan. He was obviously still in favor of 
Meagtron. He'd send Dollen away, Starscream's most vigilant 
supporter, and than rat Starscream out to Megatron. Than whe he's 
catchin some snooze, somebody pulls the plug on Starscream's spark. 
Well, that isn't going to happen.

"Captain Phobia, please let me go in Dollen's face. I could not stand 
a meeting with Megatron yet. Please, I can stay loyal if I go with 
the Alliance. But if I smell Megatron, my anger might overcloud my 
judgement. Please, for the safety of the group."
______________________________________________________________________
Brix

Brix looked at Ramulus.

"Alright.....I'm putting you in stasis lock now."

Brix opened Ramulus' back side and pressed a button, putting him into 
stasis lock. He closed the backside and fliped him over. He opened 
the chest plate and began to remove his spark.....
______________________________________________________________________
The Trainers

The Trainers walked out of their base, all ready for their mission.

"Ah, what a great day for a hunt!" shouted Prebon, "Ignatius, take to 
the skies and use your eyes to search for them. Blaze, go a bit ahead 
and sniff him out. Hammer and Bullet, you're with me."

The 5 hunters set out to find the beast Savage.
